input.sentences: the friends gathered together for a reunion .
a very large crowd ended up showing up .
they all went around reuniting with each other .
then they started a game of cricket .
they had a lot of fun spending time playing together .
output.sentences: Everyone was gathered on the deck for the party.
We took a group photo after everyone arrived but could not fit everyone in the frame.
The deck we had the party on had a great view of the town below.
After we ate, the boys played a ball game against each other.
Even though they were playing with children's toys everyone had a good time.
